verdict.summary: Page failed during static generation. Async data fetch failed or dynamic content used without proper boundaries.

dead_ends.why_fails: Loses all SSG performance benefits; pages become fully dynamic

dead_ends.action: Wrap entire page in try/catch and return empty page on error
dead_ends.why_fails: Hides real data fetching bugs; users see blank pages

workarounds.action: Use export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic' for pages that can't be statically rendered
Wrap dynamic content in Suspense boundaries for streaming
Use try/catch in async components to handle data fetch failures gracefully

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'prerender error' occurs during build-time static generation while 'static generation error' is a broader category of SSG failures.
